text: ni inkiruntu poy vitu niccayamaka inta valkkaiyil (evaraik kantalum, ennait)"tintatirkal" enru col(lit tiri)vatu tan unakkullatu, (marumaiyil) niccayamaka unakku vakkalikkappatta vetanaiyum untu atai vittum ni tappamattay; melum; ni taripattu aratanai ceytu kontiruntaye anta"nayanaip" par; niccayamaka atanaic cutterittup pinnar (campalakki) ataik katalil parattivituvom" enrar
